content: 36 long medium 37 long large 44 long xl 46 long xxl 50 long or desired length 2 meadow lane blanket - knitting pattern design by fifty four ten studio © 2023 finishing bind off in pattern stitch when work is desired length cut yarn leaving an 8 tail with a tapestry needle carefully weave in ends on the wrong side block finished blanket if desired click here to see tips on my website fiftyfourtenstudio com size modifications for wider blanket increase number of stitches cast on in sets of 8 adding 8 stitches will increase width by about 2 for a narrower blanket decrease number of stitches in sets of 8 or calculate the number of stitches 4 x any odd number = number of stitches to cast on for a longer blanket simply knit additional row as desired or until yarn is used up bind off on any row approximate yardage needed for each additional 2 in length for each blanket size baby 46 - 50 yards medium 55 - 60 yards xl 70 - 80 yards small 50 - 55 yards large 65 - 70 yards xxl 80 - 85 yards be sure to purchase additional yarn for a longer or wider blanket when in doubt…buy an extra skein need extra help meadow lane blanket knitting pattern uses an easy stitch pattern however occasionally knitters have challenges with this stitch pattern click the link below to get my free tutorial click here to download the free pdf meadow lane blanket tutorial if you have any questions contact mary lee at fiftyfourtenstudio@gmail com visit my website and shop my knitting patterns fiftyfourtenstudio com shop all of my knitting patterns on ravelry bit ly/5410studioravelry most of my knitting patterns are available on etsy sign up for my email newsletter here bit ly/5410studionewslettersignup follow me on facebook and instagram @fiftyfourtenstudio tag your instagram posts @fiftyfourtenstudio #fiftyfourtenstudio all content and photographs are the property of fifty four ten studio and may not be used without express permission pattern may not be resold copied or redistributed for any reason via hard copy email or internet posting this pattern may be used for personal use charity knitting or small scale craft sales 3 meadow lane blanket - knitting pattern design by fifty four ten studio © 2023 this blanket is reversible the stitch pattern looks exactly the same on both sides of the blanket this project looks attractive with either solid color or multi-colored yarns for the green blanket upper left i used lion brand heartland in rocky mountains the multi-colored blanket above was made by knit-o-matic yarn shop in toronto ontario using urth uneek worsted photo shared with permission for the gray blanket left i used lion brand basic stitch anti-pilling in silver heather i hope you enjoy using this pattern see my other knitting patterns on my website at fiftyfourtenstudio com 4
